attributes.action: More people to be tested for COVID-19. Relax requirements & more test centres
attributes.additional_details: It is nearly impossible to be tested for COVID-19. You either need to have visited one of the categorised countries recently or have come into contact with someone known to have the disease but you won’t be able to prove that because they can’t get tested either.
attributes.background: The requirements for testing for COVID-19 need to be relaxed. More drive-thru centres need to be set up so people don’t have visit hospitals. Allowing potentially infected people into hospitals will allow the disease to spread to vulnerable people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
